author: Ali AlManqur

review: The fact that the Streaming Stick can deliver 1080p resolution like the Roku 3 doesn't tell the whole story.  The Stick's slower processor causes on-screen action (broad movements, like an actor walking across a room) to look herky-jerky rather than smooth.  I compared the same movie side by side on the Roku 3 and the Streaming Stick and could only stand watching a few minutes via the Stick.  I tried the comparison on a 42" TV as well as a 36" and the jerky-looking action was less noticeable on the smaller screen, but still present. So the smaller the TV, the less annoying the defect might be.  But I chose to return mine as the slower processor killed the pleasure of watching movies for me.
